Summary: saw the stealth blimp headed north
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brownwood
There were no other sightings in Brownwood on or around December 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailswas out back getting some wood when i noticed some lights overhead moving slowly to the north. i could make out a giant black triangular shape moving through the breaking clouds. im not sure what the speed was but it couldnt have been more than 50-60 mph. it was totally silent and jaw droppingly awesome. i looked on the internet and there is a website for this thing. its called the stealth blimp. http:\\www.thestealthblimp.com\ thank you.
